name: Video Poker Trainer
description:
Video Poker Trainer

This Video Poker Trainor games is currently in beta and seeking feedback from live players. This is a very limited release. This release will be followed by frequent rolling updates until the production release version. Thank you in advance for your feedback.

How To Play

  • Click on the Run Game button above
  • Choose your Video Poker game (Eg. Jacks or Better)
  • When game starts place bet by clicking the BET button
  • Then click the DEAL button. You will be dealt five (5) cards.
  • Think of the best poker hand you can get from the cards you were dealt. You will be given the opportunity to hold some cards or replace others if you choose.
  • Click on the cards you would like to hold. Any cards not held will be replaced.
  • Click the DRAW button. All cards not held will be replaced with new cards.
  • The five remaining cards will determine if you win or loose in the round. For example, when playing Jacks or Better, the best poker hand from these five cards must be at least a pair of Jacks or Better to win.
Practice Your Strategy

Video Poker has one of the highest payback tables in the casino. However a player must play with perfect strategy to maximize their winning percentage. Video Poker Trainer offers the opportunity the practice different strategies before heading out the the casino. Video Poker Trainer offers all of the fun and none of the risk. Enjoy.

Feedback Welcomed

This game has been released in Beta in a limited release. We are depending on players to leave us feedback on the game play, features and bugs (in any). We view the real world comments of players like you as an integral part of the development process. Please, please, please leave a comment. We really appreciate it.
